onBoardingSubTitle1: Discover your perfect holiday home with ease.
onBoardingDescription1: Whether you're planning a family vacation, a romantic getaway, or a solo adventure, we have the ideal home waiting for you.
onBoardingSubTitle2: Find and book your dream holiday home in just a few clicks.
onBoardingDescription2: Explore a wide range of holiday homes with detailed descriptions, high-quality photos, and real guest reviews.
onBoardingSubTitle3: Save with special deals and discounts.
onBoardingDescription3: Whether you're planning a family vacation, a romantic getaway, or a solo adventure, we have the ideal home waiting for you.
onBoardingDescription4: Our secure payment system ensures your transactions are safe and seamless.
onBoardingDescription5: Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to assist you with any queries or issues.
signUpSubTitle: Sign Up and Start Your Dream Vacation Today!
forgetPasswordSubTitle: No worries! Let's get you back into your account. we will send you instructions to reset the password.
verifyAccountSubTitle: Enter the Confirmation Code We Sent to Your Email.
changePasswordSubTitle: Create a New Password to Secure Your Account
doNotReceiveCode: Don’t Received Code? Resend code in
passMisMatchValidator: Password Mis Match Please try again!
passLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
passContain: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
passNum: Password must contain at least one number.
passSpecialChar: Password must contain at special character.
invalidNum: Invalid phone number format (10 digits required).
